messages.title: What does Michael stand for?
messages.content: Michael has lived and run his own business in Burton for over 30 years. He is Leader of the Liberal Democrats on East Staffs Borough Council.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Believes that school standards can be raised through supporting good teachers not by more tests and extra paperwork.
Says we need to end targets in the NHS and things like cleaning by agencies. Cleaning should be brought back into hospitals under infection control teams who understand what they are doing.
Wants to keep the hunting ban and to see farmers paid a fair price for their produce.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Liberal Democrats are heading for shock victories in this election.

issues.education: Believes that school standards can be raised through supporting good teachers not by more tests and extra paperwork.
issues.environment: Wants to keep the hunting ban.
